revised_title: Investigation of the Thermal Decomposition of Nitrous Oxide
tldr: This study investigates the thermal decomposition of nitrous oxide and its reaction mechanisms. The authors found that the reaction is more closely related to the second order than any other order, and they discuss the implications of this finding. They also explore the influence of pressure on the reaction rate and the role of reaction products in the process. The results provide insights into the complex nature of chemical reactions and the factors that affect their rates.
